level.text: Each holder of a Manufacturer’s license shall keep and maintain upon the licensed premises adequate books and records showing all sales or other dispositions of beverages, including the following:
The name, address, and license number of the purchaser;
The quantity in gallons of each character and brand of beverage in each sale with the total price; and
The character, brand, and quantity in gallons of all beverages disposed of other than by sale.
